title: Glen Gray - The Transcription Sessions Vol. 1, 1935
description:
GLEN GRAY & THE CASA LOMA ORCHESTRA - THE TRANSCRIPTION SESSIONS VOL. 1, 1935

01. Smoke Rings    [3:39]
02. Stompin' Around    [2:28]
03. The Continental    [3:21]
04. Chinatown, My Chinatown    [2:35]
05. Carry Me Back To Old Virginny    [2:17]
06. Black Jazz    [2:54]
07. For You    [2:51]
08. The Little Man With The Hammer    [2:24]
09. My Country    [2:38]
10. Walkin' The Dog    [2:48]
11. Lady, Be Good    [2:32]
12. Bugle Call Rag    [4:24]
13. I Never Knew    [2:28]
14. Limehouse Blues    [3:27]
15. Blue Room    [3:06]
16. The Maniac's Ball    [2:04]
17. Basin Street Blues    [3:50]
18. Who's Sorry Now?    [2:35]
19. Under A Blanket Of Blue    [1:45]
20. Love And A Dime    [2:30]
21. Song Of The Islands    [3:23]
22. Sunny Disposish    [2:27]
23. Night And Day    [3:33]
24. What's The Use?    [2:34]
25. White Star Of Sigma Nu    [1:56]

Bobby Jones, Grady Watts, Sonny Dunham (tp), Billy Rauch, Fritz Hummel (tb), Pee Wee Hunt (tb & vcl), Clarence Hutchenrider, Glen Gray, Kenny Sargent, Pat Davis, Art Ralston (reeds*), Mel Jensen (vln), Joe Hall (p), Jack Blachette (g), Stanley Dennis (b), Tony Brigila (d), Kenny Sargent (vcl), Gene Gifford (arr)

Recorded in New York, February 4 & 25, 1935

* Some of the instruments in the reed sections inlude clarinet, alto tenor & baritone saxes, flute, oboe and bassoon. Members of the reed section double, triplicate and quadruple on fifferent instruments.

2002 Nostalgia Arts
